thread.title: New York City FC star Kwadwo Poku handed late Ghana call-up for Canada friendly
thread.title_full: New York City FC star Kwadwo Poku handed late Ghana call-up for Canada friendly

title: New York City FC star Kwadwo Poku handed late Ghana call-up for Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 07:40 CET New York City FC star Kwadwo Poku handed late Ghana call-up for Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Kwadwo Poku has earned Ghana call-up 
New York City FC star Kwadwo Poku has been handed a late call-up by Ghana coach Avram Grant for Tuesdayâ€™s international friendly with Canada Washington, GHANAsoccernet.com can confirm. 
The 23-year-old earns the call-up following his string of impressive performances for New York City FC in the American Major League Soccer. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
